property.name: lens.server.base.url
property.description: The base url for the lens server

property.name: lens.client.ws.request.filternames
property.description: These JAX-RS filters would be started in the specified order when lens-client starts

property.name: lens.client.query.poll.interval
property.description: Interval at which query progress will be polled. Interval has to be given in milliseconds

property.name: lens.client.connection.timeout.millis
property.description: This is the maximum amount of time a client is blocked for making the initial connection. The Default value for this property is 60 seconds.

property.name: lens.client.read.timeout.millis
property.description: This is the maximum amount of time a client read operation is blocked waiting for data. The default value of this property is 5 mins.

property.name: lens.cli.json.pretty
property.description: Should CLI try to prettify the JSON of an object before priting.

property.name: lens.cli.query.execute.timeout.millis
property.description: This property defines the timeout value when sync or --async false option is used to execute a query. The default value is 10 seconds.
